title: Mad Bull 34 Full Movie ( All 4 OVA's)

sources.title: Mad Bull 34 Full Movie ( All 4 OVA's)
sources.description: A compilation of all 4 Mad Bull 34 OVAs. THIS ANIMATION IS NOT FOR CHILDREN! ADULTS ONLY! 18+ WARNING: GRAPHIC VIOLENCE, GRAPHIC DEPICTIONS OF SEXUAL ABUSE, GRAPHIC SEXUAL CONTENT AND STRONG LANGUAGE! VIEWER DISCRETION IS STRONGLY ADVISED!  I DO NOT OWN THE RIGHTS TO THIS EPISODE 1 PLOT: A young policeman of Japanese origin is assigned for the first time to patrol in New York together with a tough veteran who uses unconventional methods when dealing with criminals. ORIGINAL RELEASE DATE: 12/21/1990 EPISODE 2 PLOT:  Tough, hot, blonde policewoman Debbie joins Eddie and Mad Bull’s squad. Eddie falls for her hard. They get to investigate a new dangerous local drug cartel. ORIGINAL RELEASE DATE: 08/21/1991 EPISODE 3 PLOT:  A series of rapes in New York put a journalist and the police patrol on alert but the murderous gang is about to finish them off. ORIGINAL RELEASE DATE: 02/21/1992 EPISODE 4 PLOT:  Eddie and Mad Bull are after a mysterious cop killer that uses a robotic exoskeleton to kill cops out of some kind of revenge. ORIGINAL RELEASE DATE 08/21/1992
